tasks.label: Build
tasks.command: $version = Get-Content VERSION; $commit = git rev-parse --short HEAD; go build -ldflags "-X main.Version=$version -X main.CommitSHA=$commit" -o twitchbot.exe ./cmd/bot

tasks.label: Build & Run
tasks.command: $version = Get-Content VERSION; $commit = git rev-parse --short HEAD; go build -ldflags "-X main.Version=$version -X main.CommitSHA=$commit" -o twitchbot.exe ./cmd/bot; .\twitchbot.exe

tasks.label: Build for Raspberry Pi
tasks.command: $version = Get-Content VERSION; $commit = git rev-parse --short HEAD; $env:GOOS='linux'; $env:GOARCH='arm64'; $env:CGO_ENABLED='0'; go build -ldflags "-X main.Version=$version -X main.CommitSHA=$commit" -o twitchbot-linux-arm64 ./cmd/bot

tasks.label: Clean Build
tasks.command: $version = Get-Content VERSION; $commit = git rev-parse --short HEAD; go clean; go build -ldflags "-X main.Version=$version -X main.CommitSHA=$commit" -o twitchbot.exe ./cmd/bot

tasks.label: Open Web UI
tasks.detail: Open the bot's web interface in browser
